## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by extensions.

# Visual Studio
.vs/

# Build results
bin/
obj/

# NuGet Packages
packages/
*.nupkg
# Keep NuGet config & restore points
!packages/*.config

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Log files
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.cache

# Publish output
*.PublishSettings
publish/
App_Data/

# Compiled DLLs and PDBs
*.dll
*.pdb

# Other ignores
_ReSharper*/
*.resharper
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
